website_summaries.verdict: The D-Link DIR-865L Wireless AC 1750 Dual Band Cloud Router makes a decent investment thanks to its cloud-based features, support for 802.11ac, and good performance on the 5GHz band.
pros: The D-Link DIR-865L Wireless AC 1750 Dual Band Cloud Router offers good performance on the 5GHz band and can be easily managed via the Internet, using a browser or mobile device
cons: The DIR-865L's performance on the 2.4GHz band and its network storage feature could be better
The router's cloud-based features are limited and fragmented

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a beast!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the DIR-865L since it was available on Amazon (January 2013) and have had no problems. I have multiple access points and bridges throughout the house and property (using a Engenus ENH200 antenna about 200ft away for our solar system). I would have to guess at any given time there is 5 to 10 devices accessing the internet. This thing is a beast! I do keep the firmware updated as needed.
customer_reviews.author: F. Hazelton

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: waist of money and it has no support...setup fail every time...dlink is sorry
customer_reviews.author: Eric Jefferson

customer_reviews.title: this router is very good
customer_reviews.text: d-link is a company that specialize in some elite routers that you have to know some networking to get them going and i was suprised that i didnt have to use that to get this 1 going. i plugged it up and it started working on its own only drawback so far is there "myd-link lite" that to me has ALOT of flaws that need to be worked out. but the hardware is very reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Ramar Quinton Price

customer_reviews.title: Works intermittedly
customer_reviews.text: My smartphones 6X faster then on my old D-Link n class. After 3 months router keeps going off line. It works a few days, a week, an hour, then quits. Will not communicate with the computer. Support language barrier a problem. Needs to be replaced but can't get past supports wanting to tweak it only to fail later.
customer_reviews.author: Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Seems faster than older N router
customer_reviews.text: My old router was a Dlink DIR-655. This one speeds up existing laptop WiFi connections by 2-3 times the original speed. On my main laptop I'm using it with a Netgear AC Dual Band (A6200) USB adapter and I'm getting the max connection speed of 866 Mbps.Signal strength appears to be weaker for computers in another room but the increased speed is a better trade off.
customer_reviews.author: R. Dean

customer_reviews.title: Great little Wireless AC router for the price I've used ...
customer_reviews.text: Great little Wireless AC router for the price I've used D-Link products for many many years it does what it's supposed to do and reliably at that. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ty Pittman

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I configured for 4 subnets. 2 at 2.4ghz and 2 at 5 ghz. Put access points on the 5 ghz subnets, and devices on the 2.4 ghz. With bandwidth spread around I can run sustained video rates internally of 200+ Mbits, no problems. It was worth every penny. I did all configurations manually.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THE ROUTER DOESNT WORK ANY TIME. I BUY SO ...
customer_reviews.text: THE ROUTER DOESNT WORK ANY TIME. I BUY SO MANY BUT THIS DOESNT WORK. BECAUSE OF THE HURACAINE AND DIDNT RETURN BECAUSE I LIVE IN ARGETINA AND NOW IM IN MIAMI AND I WANT THE POSIBILITY TO RETURN AS SOON AS POSIBLE. AS YOU SEE I BUY ANOTHER ONE.
customer_reviews.author: florencia

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for facebook wifi, but it doesnt work well
customer_reviews.text: facebook wifi is spotty at best. It allows ios devices to connect without facebook checkin.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great Router at a Great price
customer_reviews.text: Was thinking about getting the Asus AC router or the Netgear AC router but was discouraged by the price. I decided to go with D-Link as I have had great luck with their dgl-4500. This router does not dissapoint, I'm getting a good boost in speed and range and the dual band will come in handy once I get the D-Link AC usb adapter. Like I said great product, great brand, and a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This wireless router works very well. I'm not sure if I am using its full capabilities but I have had to reset it or anything yet. It has been two weeks. Now only if it'll last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Frank1

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I got much better coverage in my house with this router than my previous D-Link product. My Wi-Fi speeds also saw a marked increase. Be sure you are running the latest firmware, the 1.03 upgrade improved performance on the 2.4 band greatly.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Ray Williams

customer_reviews.title: Router
customer_reviews.text: This is an extended range dual band router. It works well. I am sure it works as advertized, but I have no method of comparison.
customer_reviews.author: bobj535

customer_reviews.title: Great Router
customer_reviews.text: Great product, the antenas does the job it was designed to do. Nice upright design and the dual chanels are helpfull.
customer_reviews.author: Malfacini

customer_reviews.title: It is performing very well.
customer_reviews.text: I am still discovering the many features the unit has. I will be able to give you a more detailed review at a later date. But so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Jean-Claude Bateau

customer_reviews.title: not bad/ not good
customer_reviews.text: This purchase has not been completely satisfactory. The device set up easily and worked right out of the box. However, the "n" band is consistently stronger than the ac band. This is unfortunate, since we used the ac band for a variety of our devices that need web service. The customer server at D-Link has consistently ignored my emails.
customer_reviews.author: the thing

customer_reviews.title: Powerful router
customer_reviews.text: The most powerful router DLink router I have ever used. I replaced an older router and my distance devices immediately began to function better than ever.
customer_reviews.author: RDonaldson

customer_reviews.title: They are easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of DLink products. They are easy to set up and use.
customer_reviews.author: James E. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I have connected on the router 2 smartphones, 1 iPad and 2 notebooks - and guess what? Speed has kept the same velocity as if devices were plugged by wire! Excellent performance, router never crashes! Totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Graciel

customer_reviews.title: Above expectations
customer_reviews.text: I bought the router mainly for its extended range on 11N (I was somehow hesitant as ALL my previous Dlink - 2 Wireless routers and a switch - products "died prematurely" and all including this one run hot). So far (2 days) I had only one issue - I got it with the settings not at default values an I had a hard time reseting it (I can still not reset it after setting it up once!). I use it mainly in bridge mode so that many of its advanced features are lost on me but the range and basic speed are impressive and once I'll get an AC receiver I might even enjoy the Gbs wireless.
customer_reviews.author: Julian Satran

customer_reviews.title: Super upgrade at a sweet price
customer_reviews.text: Great upgrade from a 300mb router... There is a 2.4ghz and a 5.0ghz settings that is a huge plus. The range is better but not for huge houses.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice Culley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent help determined that Microsoft Internet Explorer was the issue
customer_reviews.text: Update - I had a problem accessing the router settings. Called DLINK under warranty support. Excellent help determined that Microsoft Internet Explorer was the issue. Removed latest IE 11 which reverted to IE 10 and the access issue was resolved. Great support and I have no other issues with this router since purchasing in March, 2014.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Halladay

customer_reviews.title: Good Router, faster and easily to configure.
customer_reviews.text: The router DIR-865L is fast and easy to configure but I can't configure mydlink, I tried to send a message for a Dlink support but no answer. I am very sad about Dlink support.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael

customer_reviews.title: Dead out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I chose this router for an increase in speed and because of previous experience with this brand, but the wireless was not transmitting at all regardless of what steps I took, even with expert advice, I could NOT connect with a laptop or wireless printer.
customer_reviews.author: John A. Reed

customer_reviews.title: D-link AC1750
customer_reviews.text: Great enhancement on movie-Hd downloading and increases retrieval of web documents Easy to set up. Caution if you have a Dell computer. You must switch from Dell wireless to Windows in order for it to work; call D-link and they'll help you.
customer_reviews.author: Madrid25

customer_reviews.title: Dual band + excellent coverage = Winner
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for a DIR-655. With the proliferation of wireless networks in homes, dual-band was a requirement and this wireless router did not disappoint and provides much better coverage throughout our house.
customer_reviews.author: Carey J. Fujii

customer_reviews.title: Pass on this model
customer_reviews.text: Failed after 5 months! Dlink has already stopped support for this device. The positive was it's signal strength. Usually Dlink routers last for 2 years or better.
customer_reviews.author: Jinchuriki

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Meet my needs and expectations. I am utilizing for days and had no problems so far. Very easy to set up. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Milton Santos

customer_reviews.title: like other buyers, died after 30 days
customer_reviews.text: Stay away,runs very hot,lasted 45 days then started randomly Disconnecting both wireless and wired devices, never had this issue with my Asus router.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best router I've had
customer_reviews.text: I have been using D-Link wireless router for many years. When I need to get a new router I compare with other make and always have to choose D-Link because of the flexible access control feature. The MAC address based device grouping and flexible multiple schedule creation is the hallmark of the D-Link router software. With this feature I can fine control kid's Internet access scheduling exactly the way i want. Despite of the simplistic looking of DIR-865L this is the most performing and reliable of all D-Link router I've used (DIR-655, DIR-825). I'd highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Tak

customer_reviews.title: Easy to get started
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup works great so far. Streamed netflix to the xbox with no problems. Have not used the cloud feature so I can't comment on that.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Lightening Fast!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I have never experienced a router as fast as this one. The only downfall is that you cannot print wireless.
customer_reviews.author: rmbroadway

customer_reviews.title: I returned it
customer_reviews.text: It worked 100% according to TODAY's Rule. The reason I returned it is because I host websites on my home network that can be viewed outside. . They Disabled that feature. I could not access my website from my computer for testing. A DUMB MOVE by D-link.
customer_reviews.author: DrHankZ

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great and was super easy to set up. I replaced my old dlink wireless-g router that I had for years with this one. What a difference! It is very fast and the range is great!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: It was defected
customer_reviews.text: The D-link router was defected and every other day the orange LED turned on and it did not work until I reboot it by turning of and on the power. I talked to the D-link techs they told me to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: MrG

customer_reviews.title: D Link is the best
customer_reviews.text: I bought the d link router and it's amazing I can stream extremely large files with no problem I will tell all my friends this is the best router
customer_reviews.author: JERMINATOR

customer_reviews.title: This thing drops all the time.
customer_reviews.text: I work in IT as a network administrator and have had good experiences with high end D Link consumer routers, that's why I discounted all the negative reviews I saw for this. I am very sorry I did that. I lose my connection both wireless and hardwired constantly. Powering it off for long periods of time seems to work, but 5 minutes or less doesn't help. I have sent an email to D Link support about this problem but have not gotten a reply. I am shelving this piece of junk and going back to my 6 year old DIR 655 until the netgear nighthawk I just ordered gets here.
customer_reviews.author: wantdd214

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I bought this purely as it is supposed to have Facebook login on it and it does not
customer_reviews.author: john o sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Ricardo
customer_reviews.text: Hi All, I'm quite disappointed! I cannot configure it to work in bridge mode using cable for Internet signal. My D-Link router is far from my main router and wireless signal does not arrive there. D-Link e-mail for customer support does not work. I haven't had answers even being this channel available on D-Link website.
customer_reviews.author: Cristiane Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Terrible WiFi signal
customer_reviews.text: The wifi signal is worse than my old router. The wan port should have a problem, I can never use the speed of my connection is usually 10%. I'm returning, not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: acavina

product_meta.title: D-Link Wireless AC 1750 Mbps Home Cloud App-Enabled Dual-Band Gigabit Router (DIR-865L)
product_meta.description:
The D-Link Cloud Router 5700 (DIR-865L) provides revolutionary Gigabit 802.11ac wireless speed - up to 1,350Mbps – for flawless HD video streaming to multiple devices. With groundbreaking mydlink Cloud Services, you can monitor your home network from anywhere on your iPhone, iPad and Android device with our free apps. See websites that are being visited, block unwanted devices and receive email alerts when unauthorized connections are attempted

AMAZON.COM
feature_bullets: Revolutionary 80211ac speed - up to 1750Mbps, the industry's fastest wi-fi
Monitor your wireless network remotely through the myDlink Cloud app
Compatible with all existing wireless 80211 b/g/n devices
Wall-to-wall coverage with built-in high-power amplifier
Easy network set-up through iPad or iPhone Add devices at the touch of a button
Four Gigabit Ethernet ports for fast wired connectivity

specifications.Operating System: Windows® 7, Windows Vista®, Windows® XP SP2, or Mac OS® X
specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars90 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
